alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:56AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, northeastern Mason, northeastern Kanawha, northeastern Putnam, Roane and southern Jackson Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 355 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Sissonville, Clendenin, Kenna, Elkview, Amma, Leon, Mount Alto, Statts Mills, Harmony, Tariff, Given, Kentuck, Liberty, Walton, Cottageville, Left Hand, Evans, Looneyville and Fairplain. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 9 and 35. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 115 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
